fields.label: Primary Contact
fields.name: partners_primary_contact
fields.instructions: The first and last name of the primary contact with this partner

fields.label: About the Partner
fields.name: about_the_partner
fields.instructions: This is a brief excerpt about Rand Group that is maybe 2 sentences long. It appears at the end of a customer story the partner is associated with.

fields.label: Header Banner
fields.name: header_banner
fields.instructions: Blog post header banners must be 878px  x 380px.

fields.label: Tracking Codes
fields.name: footer_code
fields.instructions: Google analytics is driven via a plugin, do not include here.

fields.name: button_css_classes
fields.instructions: CSS Classes available for "CSS Predefined Style" selection.

btn-default
btn-primary
btn-success
btn-info
btn-warning
btn-danger
btn-link
